name: PostgreSQL
description: Connect directly to any PostgreSQL or compatible database (including Amazon RDS, Google Cloud SQL, and Neon) to use as a high-performance source or destination. Replicate entire tables or use our schema discovery to select specific columns for your flows.

name: MySQL
description: The world's most popular open-source database, now a first-class citizen in Saddle Data. Use MySQL as a reliable source or a powerful destination for any of your data pipelines. Replicate entire tables or use our schema discovery to select specific columns for your flows.

name: BigQuery
description: Load your data into Google's powerful, petabyte-scale cloud data warehouse. Centralize all your sources into BigQuery to build a single source of truth for your BI, analytics, and machine learning workflows.

name: Cassandra
description: Tap into the massively scalable, always-on NoSQL database. Use SaddleData to easily extract critical data from your Cassandra clusters for complex analytics, or load enriched data back into Cassandra to power your high-availability applications.

name: AWS Cost Explorer
description: Automatically extract detailed cost and usage data from your AWS account via the Cost Explorer API. Stop manually downloading reports and build automated pipelines to analyze your cloud spend.

name: Metronome
description: Load transformed usage and cost data directly into the Metronome billing platform. Automate your FinOps workflows by sending precisely formatted billing events from any source to Metronome's ingest API.

name: Google Sheets
description: Use any Google Sheet as a flexible data source or a powerful reporting destination. Extract data from specific tabs for analysis, or load the results of a complex flow into a sheet for easy sharing with non-technical team members.

name: Email (via SendGrid)
description: Turn any data flow into an actionable report. The Email destination allows you to take the results of a flow, convert them to a CSV file, and automatically email it as an attachment using your own SendGrid account for professional delivery.

name: Email (via SMTP2GO)
description: Turn any data flow into an actionable report. The Email destination allows you to take the results of a flow, convert them to a CSV file, and automatically email it as an attachment using your own SMTP2GO account for professional, high-deliverability sending.
